subject: Hompan Cup (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: United States lost to Denmark, 2-1, at the Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia, with Caroline Wozniacki and Frederik Nielsen beating Bethanie Mattek-Sands and Mardy Fish.
snippet: United States lost to Denmark, 2-1, at the Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia, with Caroline Wozniacki and Frederik Nielsen beating Bethanie Mattek-Sands and Mardy Fish.
